name: Lord of darkness
description:
An arena shooter where shooting hurts you, consuming your enemies is the only way to survive.

This game was made in 3 days during the MiniJam 103.

Controls :

Use either WASD or ZQSD to move

Left click to shoot

Space to consume a dead enemy

Quick tip :

Dead enemies heal you slightly more than it hurts you to shoot. Kill them all !

This game uses Audio assets made by Kenney.

Everything else was made by me.
